Articles.Content:
Yeah, my bad. I accidentally eva-ed jeb to hopefully save him from a crashing spaceplane. He got KIA and did not respawn. His friend in the cockpit, bill got mia and respawned a few days later. Can anyone explain this?

Difficulty: medium.
Interesting. I'm going to have to test that.

Sacrifice some kerbals in the mohole to appease the great kraken. That or wait for the devs. Or do some save file editing.

Open the persistence in your saves folder with notepad or something, then go find Jeb’s info and change his state to available. Google for more details.
I know how to fix it, its just that its funny. And i want to know how to reproduce it.

5 hours ago, Xd the great said:

I know how to fix it, its just that its funny. And i want to know how to reproduce it.

I'm not a coding genius, but maybe it'll help if you take a look at the debugging console.

I'm curious as to how he died. Kerbonauts now have personal chute past some level. Was he too inexperience to have his chute? Was the plane too low for using one, or did he crash into an engine or burned to high speed or something? For a not so dramatic accident saving both pilot should be doable.
He probably ate it because he jumped out of a moving plane. Kerbals can’t deploy their chutes right away. xd also may have had g force black out on.
That happened in my career mode. Since then I started editing my save file to give level 3+ orange jumpsuits and realized I could just bring Jeb back to life the same way.

it happened again today, when i accidentally spazzed a kerbal out retracting the string he is attached to. He gets KIA, and is non cancellable. No buttons to dismiss him.

seeing if he respawns.

If by medium you mean moderated well....

It says that missing crew will not respawn so jebediah not respawning should be normal

And it says missing meaning that only M.I.A (missing in action)Will comeback but K.I.A`s(killed in action) wont

But if you meant normal i dont know
How do you get a Kerbal missing without him being dead ?

11 hours ago, Gilead said:

How do you get a Kerbal missing without him being dead ?

I think you need to crash on kerbin

If you have the respawn option turned on, then any Kerbal that dies anywhere is supposed to be marked MIA (not KIA), and they are supposed to respawn. If there is a bug here, it might be that Kerbals on EVA are still being marked as "killed" instead of MIA.
Nope, I can't repro this bug in stock. No matter how I kill my EVA kerbals, they are always MIA if respawn is turned on. So this is likely to be a bug from a mod.
Yes, he was marked as KIA. Dunno why, but i allowed crew respawn. He opened his chute, but he got stuck on a air intake. Oops.
This thread is about a problem probably solved a long time ago. Locking the thread to prevent confusion.

3 hours ago, T-20000 said:

It was fixed.

But thank you for helping fellow players, and and welcome to the forum.
